description: Give the family a brilliant barbecue feed with sticky harissa and honey chicken kebabs with pita, yoghurt, red onion, salad and tomato relish.
name: Harissa & Honey Chicken Kebabs With Yoghurt & Pita Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg Woolworths BBQ Chicken Drumstick Fillet Kebabs With Harissa & Honey Glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Cook chicken kebabs on an oiled barbecue grill according to packet instructions. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 2 minutes. Remove skewers from chicken. Spread pitas with yoghurt. Divide salad mix among pitas, then top with chicken, onion and a little of the tomato relish.
